ing: 1 (15 ounce) can mandarin orange sections, drained
1/4 cup sweetened dried cranberries (such as CraisinsÂ®)
des: "Fresh spinach leaves topped with strawberries, bananas, mandarin oranges, CraisinsÂ®, toasted sesame seeds, walnuts, and a honey dressing. Also good with some chicken strips mixed in."
ins:
Toss spinach, strawberries, bananas, mandarin oranges, cranberries, and walnuts together in a large bowl.
Combine vinegar, oil, honey, and garlic powder in a jar with a tight-fitting lid. Seal jar and shake vigorously until the ingredients emulsify into a dressing; pour over the spinach mixture. Sprinkle sesame seeds over salad to serve.
